title: Blended Learning Design and Application for Corporate Science Education

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: A teaching competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers, aiming to strengthen advanced job skills in science through blended learning with digital devices. Learning outcomes are measured via summative assessments, with a flexible schedule enabling work-life balance.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately analyze and interpret scientific experimental data using a blended learning platform (online modules + offline workshops).
Learners can apply 80% or more of the theories acquired through self-directed learning to practical projects (scientific tasks within enterprises).
Learners can design and simulate experimental processes using digital tools (e.g., virtual lab simulators).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
